title: Fontcaster
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Fontcaster**

A one person [font foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/foundry) which has designed Rattlescript, released by [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont), the Aptifer Sans and Aptifer Slab, released by [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype), and Skilt Gothic released by [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau).

Fontcaster is run by [Mårten Thavenius](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023135655/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Marten%20Thavenius).

-----

author: Textism
